title: Set Linux baseline to Ubuntu; remove Arch/WSL specifics
body:
Linux support should be Ubuntu-first.

- Remove WSL:Arch defaults and Arch-specific notes
- Prefer apt-based installers for Linux
- Update comments and conditionals accordingly

Acceptance: setup completes cleanly on Ubuntu; no Arch/WSL defaults remain.

title: Fix incorrect shebang in etc/load.sh
body:
Change shebang to portable form.

- Replace `#!/usr/bash` with `#!/usr/bin/env bash`

Acceptance: scripts sourcing load.sh work across environments.

title: Guard anyenv init and fix KREW_ROOT typo in .zshrc
body:
Harden shell init.

- Wrap anyenv init with existence check
- Fix env var typo: KWER_ROOT -> KREW_ROOT

Acceptance: login shell works without anyenv; krew PATH resolves.

title: Make etc/link.sh POSIX-safe or switch to bash
body:
Avoid non-POSIX syntax under /bin/sh.

- Use `[` instead of `[[` or change shebang to bash

Acceptance: symlink deployment runs on macOS and Ubuntu.

title: Replace destructive rm -rf ~/.config in etc/set.sh
body:
Make setup non-destructive and idempotent.

- Remove `rm -rf ~/.config`
- Backup then link only required files

Acceptance: user configs are preserved; re-run safe.

title: Modernize Homebrew installers (drop linuxbrew-wrapper)
body:
Update install flows.

- Remove linuxbrew-wrapper usage
- mac: use official script; linux: prefer apt flow
- Refresh package list (e.g., ripgrep)

Acceptance: fresh install works on mac/Ubuntu.

title: Codespaces: install Neovim from package manager
body:
Speed up and simplify Codespaces setup.

- Use package manager binaries instead of source build
- Remove hardcoded persistedshare paths

Acceptance: faster Codespaces provisioning; no hardcoded paths.

title: Fix typos in configs (efm lint-formats, neoterm position, log_warn)
body:
Minor correctness fixes.

- efm: use `lint-formats` consistently
- neoterm.nvim: `position` key
- etc/load.sh: rename duplicate log_fail to log_warn

Acceptance: no warnings; expected behavior restored.

title: coc-settings: remove hardcoded clangd.path or add fallback
body:
Make clangd integration portable.

- Remove user-specific path or gate behind exists()

Acceptance: nvim starts without clangd installed; uses default path when present.

title: rust-analyzer: set updates channel to stable
body:
Stabilize RA updates.

- Use `stable` channel by default; document nightly opt-in

Acceptance: fewer breaking updates from rust-analyzer.

title: tmux: reduce status-interval and guard status commands
body:
Lower CPU usage and add fallbacks.

- Increase status-interval (e.g., 5s)
- Wrap external scripts with `|| echo "-"` to avoid hangs

Acceptance: lower idle CPU; robust status line without deps.

title: Remove absolute nvim symlink and document alternative
body:
Avoid environment-specific symlink.

- Remove `nvim -> /Users/...` or replace with relative
- Add README note for linking

Acceptance: repo clones cleanly on non-mac paths.

title: .gitignore: add exceptions for tracked configs (wezterm, etc.)
body:
Ensure new config dirs can be tracked.

- Extend exceptions under /.config to cover used tools

Acceptance: added config files are not accidentally ignored.

title: Add ShellCheck + CI workflow for shell scripts
body:
Introduce shell linting in CI.

- Add shellcheck to workflow
- Target etc/ and bin/ scripts

Acceptance: CI runs shellcheck and reports issues.

title: Docs: document Ubuntu baseline and keybindings
body:
Improve README for new setups.

- State Ubuntu-first baseline and prerequisites
- Install steps (apt/brew), troubleshooting
- Keybindings for tmux/telescope/coc

Acceptance: newcomers can set up from README alone.
